name: John Black: Memories
description: John Black: Memories is a remake of a 2D classic platformer available in the early 2000s, called "Johnny Megatone". Dive into the seeking of Mr. Zeta, a naughty killer who took out your girlfriend, Lona.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32/64 bit) Processor: Generic CPU Graphics: Generic GPU Storage: 25 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32/64 bit) Processor: Generic CPU Graphics: Generic GPU Storage: 25 MB available space
